actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Jackson Lee amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment to direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to the Congress a report on methods to increase electric grid resilience with respect to all threats, including cyber attacks, vandalism, terrorism, and severe weather, no later than 120 days after the date of enactment of the Act.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-359 to direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to the Congress a report on methods to increase electric grid resilience with respect to all threats, including cyber attacks, vandalism, terrorism, and severe weather, no later than 120 days after the date of enactment of the Act.
